name: Leaders
description:
Tiny war game built for the 5th Brackeys Game Jam!

In DotPlace County, almost everyone is completely braindead... except for YOU! It is time for the smartest to take control of DotPlace once and for all!

However, before you can do this, you must fight your way through the Endless Tower of Leaders, and make an army on the way!

With a dumb but charming supporter, make your way up the Endless Tower, recruit the people who happen to be there for some reason, and give DotPlace a real education!

Tutorial in-game.
